Detailed Description

The Phone Miscellaneous Interface.

VoIP Phone Misc.

VoIP Phone miscellaneous TAPI. See detail below.

Function Documentation

int32 rtk_OffHookAction ( uint32  chid)

OffHook Action function. Call this TAPI always when Off-Hook event is got.

Parameters
chidThe channel number.
Return values
0Success
See Also
rtk_GetFxsEvent, rtk_GetFxoEvent
Examples:
conference.c, custom_tone.c, fxo.c, fxs.c, phone.c, and rtp.c.
int32 rtk_OnHookAction ( uint32  chid)

OnHook Action function. Call this TAPI always when On-Hook event is got.

Parameters
chidThe channel number.
Return values
0Success
See Also
rtk_GetFxsEvent, rtk_GetFxoEvent
Examples:
conference.c, custom_tone.c, fxo.c, fxs.c, phone.c, and rtp.c.
int rtk_GetIpPhoneHookStatus ( uint32 *  pHookStatus)

Get hook status of IP Phone.

Parameters
pHookStatusHook status
0: Off-hook
1: On-hook
int rtk_SetLedDisplay ( uint32  chid,
uint32  LED_ID,
LedDisplayMode  mode 
)

Set LED display mode.

Parameters
chidChannel number
LED_IDLED ID. Each channel has at most 2 LED, and we use 0 normally.
modeDisplay mode. Please refer to /ref LedDisplayMode.
Return values
0Success
int rtk_SetFxsFxoLoopback ( unsigned int  chid,
unsigned int  enable 
)

Set FXS/FXO into Loopback Mode (Hardtware Loopback)

Parameters
chidThe FXS channel number
enableEnable flag

Enable flag Description SLIC Supported
0 Disable FXS/FXO loopback Silab SI32178
1 Enable FXS/FXO loopback Silab SI32178
Return values
0Success
